summary: So, the British and Irish Quidditch League apparently has thirteen professional teams, right?  Each one presumably has seven...
body:
So, the British and Irish Quidditch League apparently has thirteen professional teams, right? 

Each one presumably has seven players, a few reserves, a coach, a manager, a healer, and a couple of people to deal with equipment and stuff. Let’s say fifteen people.

13 x 15 = 195

Let me repeat that: 13 x 15 = 195

Hogwarts has less than 300 students. The best figure we have for the wizarding population of Britain is 3000 people. 

When you take into account the merchandisers, the people managing the stadiums, and the organisers of the league…close to 10% of Britain’s magical population works in the Quidditch industry.


…no wonder it’s a big deal at Hogwarts.

summary: Oof
body:
Oof

So i went with my friends to watch the crimes of Grindelwald( it was great btw) and we’re sitting on the last row and a couple sits right next to us and the guy keep laughing _so loudly_ throughout the whole movie, even at points where it wasn’t even that funny. But still he has a right to laugh, and we all payed to watch the movie and it wasnt really that annoying so we didn’t say anything cause really he looked like he was having a good time and we’re not going to tell him to stop laughing.

So then the credits role in and me and my friends( we were only 3 btw) just stayed a bit to see if maybe there was an after credits scene( there wasn’t) and my dumb ass friend fell off her fucking chair and we start laughing at her, and the guy just starts going like

“Ummmmm you’re being extremely loud and we’re trying to enjoy the movie here so if you want to leave you can just go, like really just leave “

Sweetie, the movie already ended, not sure if you realized, and why yes thank you for reminding us that we can leave if we want to, but thing is, we dont want to.

summary: Draco to Harry: one universe. nine planets. one earth. seven continents, seven seas. 195 countries. 809 islands. and I had the...
body:
Draco to Harry: one universe. nine planets. one earth. seven continents, seven seas. 195 countries. 809 islands. and I had the immense luck of meeting you.

Pansy, from the other room: THERE ARE EIGHT PLANETS

Draco, screaming and on the verge of tears: VIVA LA PLUTO! FUCK YOU!

summary: How much do you love the Fifth Day of Christmas?

To awnser your question, probably as much as the rest of Christmas!

summary: Daniel Radcliffe explica por que não pretende assistir à peça Cursed Child
title: Daniel Radcliffe explica por que não pretende assistir à peça Cursed Child
description:
Em entrevista para o The Late Show with Seth Meyers, o ator Daniel Radcliffe explicou por que não pretende assistir a peça Harry Potter and the Cursed Child, em cartaz em Londres e na Broadway.

“Não seria uma noite relaxante no teatro”, conta o ator. “Sinto que estariam observando minhas reações. Talvez seja completamente egocêntrico e as pessoas não ligariam, mas acho que estar cercados de fãs de Harry Potter seria meio esquisito…”

(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

Diversos atores que passaram pelos filmes já viram a peça, incluindo Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Tom Felton, Helena Bonham Carter, Julie Walters, Michael Gambon, Eddie Redmayne, Dan Fogler e Ezra Miller, além da própria J.K. Rowling, que já admitiu ter visto a produção diversas vezes.

Daniel Radcliffe está em cartaz na Broadway com a peça The Lifespan of a Fact até janeiro de 2019, além de estar se prepararando para os lançamentos dos filmes Guns Akimbo e Playmobil: O Filme. 

The post Daniel Radcliffe explica por que não pretende assistir à peça Cursed Child appeared first on Potterish.com.

summary: Fic claim: A picture of rice cake
title: Fic claim: A picture of rice cake
body:
Rating: Explicit
Warnings/Content Notes: fluff, humor, banter, friends with benefits, porn with feelings, anal sex, implied switching, morning after, breakfast, pancakes, Korean food, Harry with an Asian background, post-Hogwarts
Word Count: 7k
Summary: (For prompt) After a night of hot sex, Draco wakes up to the smell of Harry cooking. When he eats his food Draco vows that’s it, Harry’s making him breakfast forever. (Additions: Banter, humor, Draco plotting to move in)
Written for: H/D Food Fair 2018

A million thanks to my amazing beta @jet-playin for being awesome as always!!! 💖💖💖 And thank you guys for all the sweet and lovely comments so far! I was a bit nervous about how people would react to Harry with Korean ancestry, but you guys have blown my mind! Thank you so so much! I had so much fun writing this 💖  

Read on AO3

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.description: (prev. staryjoy) Milan, Italy. She/her. 24. INTJ, Type 1. Art history student. Don’t even dare to think that this blog won’t be multifandom. I create original contents, when I’m not too lazy to do it.Buy me a coffee I accept both fics and edits requests but check my ships page before. mobile thanks to @littlebird
